snippet: The convergence reflects the fact that suicide numbers are rising slightly among both veterans and everyone else, but has increased more in the general population.
abstract: Department of Veterans Affairs reports suicides among military veterans, though up slightly in recent years, account for shrinking percentage of nation's total number of suicides; convergence reflects fact that suicide numbers are rising slightly among both veterans and everyone else, but has increased more in general population.
lead_paragraph: The convergence reflects the fact that suicide numbers are rising slightly among both veterans and everyone else, but has increased more in the general population.

headline.seo: Veterans Make Up Shrinking Percentage of Suicides
headline.main: As Suicides Rise in U.S., Veterans Are Less of Total
headline.print_headline: As Suicides Rise in U.S., Veterans Are Less of Total
